mapper.select: SELECT id, content, expired_at, important_yn, completed_yn, created_at, updated_at FROM todo
SELECT id, content, expired_at, important_yn, completed_yn, created_at, updated_at FROM todo WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todo (id, content, expired_at, important_yn, completed_yn, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{content}, #{expiredAt}, #{importantYn}, #{completedYn}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE content = #{content}, expired_at = #{expiredAt}, important_yn = #{importantYn}, completed_yn = #{completedYn}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}
